article_text:
Trans-identified people fear anti-trans bias in health care settings, data show

Transgender people in Valley often travel to Bay Area and larger cities for services

Higher rates of depression and HIV infections are among health concerns for trans community

article_metadata.title: Transgender community faces unique challenges in access to health care | The Merced Sun-Star

og.description: The transgender community has become quite the subject of several discussions in recent months. Especially with public figures, such as Caitlyn Jenner and actress Laverne Cox, making headlines.
og.title: Transgender community faces unique challenges in access to health care
